fields.helpSection:
Login to your Meraki account 
 Go to Dashboard -> Edit Profile 
 To the right side, you should see the personal access token generated associated with your user account

fields.description: Company name registered with meraki account
fields.helpSection:
Enter the comapny name that you provided when you signed up to meraki 
 If your airtable account URL is: domainname.<company_name>.com then your domain name is acmecorp
